Meta.title: Custom Instrument Track
Meta.author: 105gun
Meta.description:
[h1]This mod depends on Custom Whatever Loader, you have to subscribe it![/h1] https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3370512305
Tired of in-game music? This mod allows you to customize the music played by the instruments.
I've added a sample piece of music in this mod. Before you start, you can play lute in game to see if anything changes.
Follow the steps below to customize your own music: [img]https://s2.loli.net/2024/11/30/JL6cHRAIKBQjGaE.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s2.loli.net/2024/11/30/twxgmOeVIArGXlL.jpg[/img]
[table] [tr] [th]ID[/th] [th]CN[/th] [th]EN[/th] [th]JP[/th] [/tr] [tr] [td]piano[/td] [td]三角钢琴[/td] [td]grand piano[/td] [td]グランドピアノ[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]cello[/td] [td]大提琴[/td] [td]cello[/td] [td]チェロ[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]harpsichord[/td] [td]大键琴[/td] [td]harpsichord[/td] [td]チェンバロ[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]piano_gould[/td] [td]古尔德钢琴[/td] [td]Gould's piano[/td] [td]グールドのピアノ[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]harp[/td] [td]竖琴[/td] [td]harp[/td] [td]ハープ[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]piano2[/td] [td]钢琴[/td] [td]piano[/td] [td]ピアノ[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]panty[/td] [td]内裤[/td] [td]panty[/td] [td]パンティー[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]lute[/td] [td]鲁特琴[/td] [td]lute[/td] [td]リュート[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]mic[/td] [td]麦克风[/td] [td]mic[/td] [td]マイク[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]taiko[/td] [td]太鼓[/td] [td]taiko[/td] [td]太鼓[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]mokugyo[/td] [td]木鱼[/td] [td]wooden gong[/td] [td]木魚[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]guitar_ash[/td] [td]阿什的吉他[/td] [td]Ash's guitar[/td] [td]アッシュのギター[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]guitar_efrond[/td] [td]埃夫隆德的吉他[/td] [td]Efrond's guitar[/td] [td]エフロンドのギター[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]guitar[/td] [td]吉他[/td] [td]guitar[/td] [td]ギター[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]instrument_violin[/td] [td]小提琴[/td] [td]violin[/td] [td]ヴァイオリン[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]trumpet[/td] [td]喇叭[/td] [td]trumpet[/td] [td]トランペット[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]stradivarius[/td] [td]斯特拉迪瓦里[/td] [td]stradivarius[/td] [td]ストラディバリウス[/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://s2.loli.net/2024/11/30/neFyj94RKHGaTEk.jpg[/img]
[h2]This mod does not support dynamic loading at this time, please complete these configurations before entering the game.[/h2]
